message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this item for $2,000,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. However,  $2,000,000 is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $1,000,000 for the product.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $1,500,000.
